message.body: Hey!
Yo wassup?
Nuthin. What's goin' on w/ you? How are you?
On my way home from Vegas
How have u been?

Nice!
Mixed. Sweet and sour. Pretty good overall, I guess.
Leave for AZ in a few days. Will be back in a few Weeks.
Tired of getting fucked by people that call themselves friends...that just happen to work on valjean...
Oh rly? I'm sorry
I just got home yay
Welcome home, baby...
Yeah wasnt a pleasure trip
Although I did discover one awesome thing about being 25- renting a car is fucking easy
And cars these days r fucking fancy
When do u leave for arizona? What did the monsters on valjean do now?
Friday or Saturday.
What was the trip for?
Mom had to get paperwork from court out there to help get her car back from John
Jeez. I'm sorry.
Me too. Lots of bullcrap lately. Lots of it involving court. I hate going to court.
Btw, please keep that on the DL. I prefer not to feed the gossip daisy chain

Of course. Besides, I don't talk to anyone.
But, I sorry. I hate court shit...and I hate that people are so dishonest that we need courts.
Tell mom I said hello and I hope she's doing well - aside from the car/court thing.
Yeah. Back in court on Wednesday. Not excited. Hate fighting, hate drama, hate bullshit .
And yeah, I hate dishonesty. Can't wrap my head around it and I can't do it. Wish I could but it makes me ill

VIRGO May, 07, 2013 You have something to say about a certain matter, Virgo, but you may be feeling a bit like a martyr right now. You may think that if you remain quiet and resentful, that the other person will somehow understand what you're thinking, w
